text: “Ndithu Allah wafunira zabwino Mtumiki Wake ndi Amuhajirina ndi Answari amene adamtsatira iye (Muhammad {s.a.w}) m’nthawi yamasautso (pokamenyana ndi Aroma pankhondo ya Tabuk), nthawi yomwe mitima ya ena a iwo idatsala pang’ono kupotoka (kutsata machitidwe achikafiri); kenako Allah adawatembenukira ndi chifundo. Ndithu Iye (Allah) kwa iwo Ngodekha, Ngwachisoni chosatha
